name: markdown
description: Minimal Markdown to Hiccup to HTML parser / transformer
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.build: yarn clean && parcel build index.html -d out --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache --experimental-scope-hoisting --detailed-report
scripts.build-parser: yarn clean && parcel build src/parser.ts -d out --global md --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-cache --experimental-scope-hoisting --detailed-report --experimental-scope-hoisting
